lender.name: Akinbo Rahmon

lender.name: Nora

lender.name: Annie
lender.loan_because: I have many blessings in my life - a loving and close family, good friends and ability to earn for a comfortable life and feel it's ethical to "pay it forward" . I am very happy to that I can lend to women in Bali as I have loved Balinese people and culture and spirituality since 1978 when I first visited there.
lender.occupational_info: Casting director & lecturer for film & TV

lender.occupational_info: I am retired now but I am an entrepreneur at heart. I am always actively investigating new opportunities.
